short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy and paste git issues in a pretty format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PrettyGit is a Chrome extension designed to streamline your GitHub workflow by providing a quick and easy way to copy pull request details in a formatted, customizable markdown template. With a single click, this extension extracts information from GitHub pull requests and transforms it into a pre-defined format, making it easy to share or document PR information in an organized manner.

Features:
• Copy Github pull requests as pre-defined customizable template
• Exclude specific string from repository title
    • Useful for entrerprise repositories with mandatory prefixes
• Save settings across sessions

Coming soon:
• Support for Gitlab and Bitbucket
• Copy Github issues

Download PrettyGit today and simplify your GitHub pull request workflow!
